abstract: News of the investigation of Peter J. Eichler Jr. came as his firm, Aletheia Research and Management, filed for bankruptcy protection late Sunday after a wave of client withdrawals.
snippet: News of the investigation of Peter J. Eichler Jr. came as his firm, Aletheia Research and Management, filed for bankruptcy protection late Sunday after a wave of client withdrawals.

headline.main: S.E.C. Said to Be Investigating Money Manager’s Trading Practices
headline.print_headline: Money Manager Whose Firm Filed for Bankruptcy Is Said to Be Under Investigation
